short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cashware provides interface from chrome software to supported external hardware, thus allowing deposits and withdraws to TCR devices

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CashWare extension provides a connection point for the browser-based banking application to CashWare. CashWare middleware allows users to utilize cash recycling hardware as part of the transaction process. This extension will allow bi-directional information flow between the two in-house applications.
